title: Unable to connect to chat
body:
Game updated again today ( pretty sure to change the log in screen ) and now me and friends are unable to connect to chat.


edit* IT'S BACK BOYS

replies.body: There were intermittent issues with chat per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything should be okay now!
I am having the same issue on NA.
also having this issue right now, was fine before the patch.. now it wont connect to chat, 0 people online.. unable to reconect
Experiencing the same problem following the update.
same here.  Did a full repair, and still can't connect
I am having the same issue also
Same issue for me right now. It was working about half an hour ago but now it won't connect.
